newsitem.title: ZAIRE: Zaire soldiers target cameraman, kill bystanders.
newsitem.headline: Zaire soldiers target cameraman, kill bystanders.

text.p: Two bystanders were killed when Zairean soldiers opened fire on a Reuters Television cameraman in the eastern city of Kisangani, the cameraman said on Thursday.
Marc Hoogsteyns, a Belgian, said he was not hit in the shooting but was beaten up in the incident at Kisangani airport on Tuesday.
He was subsequently questioned by security authorities and allowed to return to the Zaire capital.
Security officials told him two bystanders, including one driver and one soldier, died of their gunshot wounds.
Kisangani is in a state of high tension with the arrival of a continuous stream of soldiers retreating from the eastern frontier after being pushed back by Rwandan-backed Tutsi rebels.
